CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Because the lamellar spacing in P1 ( 19.2 Å ) was smaller than in P7 ( 24.1 Å ) , the length of the side chains in BDTT is not the main factor in determining the lamellar spacing in P1 , P3 , P4 , P5 , and P7 ; the lamellar spacing is mainly determined by the length of the side chains in DPP and TPD.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P1 |
| P7 |
| BDTT (side chains in BDTT) |
| DPP (side chains in DPP) |
| TPD (side chains in TPD) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P1 |
| P7 |
| BDTT |
| DPP |
| TPD |

Note: In this case, all the entities in the paragraph can be considered material names as they refer to specific types of compounds or phases (P1, P3, P4, P5, P7, BDTT, DPP, and TPD).
